Job Description
We are currently seeking senior-level software engineer to join our growing team. You will be part of a team responsible for building out next generation Trade Management solution.
You'll be working closely with the Delivery Manager, IT development and Architecture groups. Previously worked with business teams, defining business functional requirements, and translating them into technical specifications aligned with Delivery Manager Architecture framework. Balance technology and business issues as well as communicate appropriately with both groups.
You'll act as liaison and participate in defining technology solutions to solve complex, multidisciplinary business problems with long-term implications. Recommend solutions to improve business decision-making with a focus on core architecture, technology strategies and standards.
You will work closely with the development team, tracking assignments and provide mentorship in the development of standard methodologies, conducting code reviews and overseeing code deployment to QA, UAT & Production.

Responsibilities include:
  • Participate in all stages of software development lifecycle including design, development and testing of the system.
  • Work with the business analysts to understand the user requirements and come up with software solutions.
  • Design algorithms to provide ability to mine thru millions of transaction documents
  • Implement system to efficiently consume thousands of transaction documents per second
  • co-ordinate with others in and outside the team for requirement and delivery
To be successful, you'll need:
  • Strong project management and organizational abilities
  • Facilitation and issue resolution
  • Negotiation skills and ability to work in a complex, matrix environment
  • Written, verbal communication and Presentation skills
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and experience at dealing with clients/users at all levels, singly and in groups.
  • Understanding the significance of fiscal constraints
  • Excellent understanding of system development life cycle and the concepts and practices required to implement effective information systems.
  • Work on multiple tasks at any one time while maintaining high quality standards
  • Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills, specific to highly technical and customer focused service environment.
Qualifications
  • At least 5+ years of MarkLogic development & architecture experience (preferable using version 8 or 9) building 3-tier application
  • Strong knowledge of XQuery, JavaScript, SPARQL, RDF Data, triples, Document based content search concepts are essential
    XML technologies such as XSLT, XPath, etc.
  • Extensive experience with developing scalable enterprise grade applications using Java, JavaScript, Scala or GO
  • Ability to architect and implement MarkLogic from scratch (Data modeling as well)
  • Working knowledge on Data Governance, best practices and design principles.
  • Ontology and Meta data management
  • Excellent analytical and communications skills
  • Experience in Agile Development practices and code management best practices
    Degree or diploma in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related discipline

    Even Better:
  • Understanding of streaming and micro service concepts
  • Experience with building applications for cloud
  • Test harness using JMeter & Selenium
  • Artificial intelligence and machine learning
  • Brokerage or financial industry experience will be considered an asset
